params.network: network on behalf of which the reward to distribute

claimRewards(address,address,bytes).notice: Claim rewards using a given token.

claimable(address,address,bytes).notice: Get an amount of rewards claimable by a particular account of a given token.

distributeRewards(address,address,uint25.notice: Distribute rewards on behalf of a particular network using a given token.

version().notice: Get a version of the staker rewards contract (different versions mean different interfaces).
